original_text: Then David took hold on his clothes, and rent them; and likewise all the men that were with him:
korean_text: 이에 다윗이 자기 옷을 잡아 찢으매 함께 있는 모든 사람도 그리하고

sentences.original_text: Then David took hold on his clothes
and likewise all the men that were with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 함께 있던 모든 사람들도 마찬가지로 그렇게 하였습니다
